Tequila.Name: Cazadores Reposado Tequila
Tequila.Description: This reposado from Cazadores (meaning “hunters”) is a 100% agave sourced from the Highlands of Jalisco. It is aged for just over two months in small, virgin oak barrels.

Liqueur.Name: Cointreau
Liqueur.Description: Both Triple Sec and curacao are orange flavored liqueurs.

Other.Name: Agave
Other.Description: Agave syrup comes from the agave plant, a succulent that is native to dry regions in Mexico
